children.name: NDACompanyRestrict
children.definition: This is the restrictions of disclosure placed on the COMPANY by the Supplier so the SOW 'ideas' cannot be shared.

children.name: NDASupplierRestrict
children.definition: This is the restriction of disclosure placed on the SUPPLIER by the Company so the SOW 'ideas' cannot be shared.

children.name: AdherencetoLaws
children.definition: Clause that says both companies will follow laws and regulations.

children.name: IntellectualCapital
children.definition: Any clauses describing Intellectual Capital Protections or assumptions.

children.name: Compliance
children.definition: Onbaording, property agreement that either party must COMPLY to.

children.name: GoverningContract
children.definition: Clauses that say which contract can govern over another. This classification also includes Master Services Agreement that reference a larger agreement saying the SOW is under that guidance.

children.name: WorkSingatureRequirements
children.definition: specifies that the COMPANY accepts the payment conditions and the SUPPLIER agrees to complete the specified work & the contract is valid

children.name: FPTerms
children.definition: Explination of Fixed Price Payment Terms.

children.name: PaymentTerms
children.definition: Late payments, early payments, when payments are due, format of payments.

children.name: CompanyActivities
children.definition: These are the actions or activities the Company will 'do' under the agreement.

children.name: CompanyRolesandResponsibilities
children.definition: The Staffing the Company is to bring to the work.

children.name: SupplierActivities
children.definition: These are the actions or activities the supplier will do under the agreement.

children.name: SupplierRolesandResponsibilities
children.definition: The Staffing the Supplier is to Bring to the work.

children.name: SpecialTerms
children.definition: Any terms specific to this engagement especially any specific clauses made by Supplier or Cisco as well as any termination terms.

children.name: TravelTerms
children.definition: Travel Terms.

children.name: ThirdPartyProperty
children.definition: Clauses that  specify the usage of any third party property by SUPPLIER to complete the Work and SUPPLIER will be responsible for the payment

children.name: ExecutiveSummary
children.definition: This is the restriction of disclosure placed on the SUPPLIER by the Company so the SOW 'ideas' cannot be shared.

children.name: WorkProductSpecifications
children.definition: specifies the technical, functional and other specifications of the work product

children.name: WorkingConstraint
children.definition: This is the restriction of disclosure placed on the SUPPLIER by the Company so the SOW 'ideas' cannot be shared.

children.name: WorkLocation
children.definition: This is the restriction of disclosure placed on the SUPPLIER by the Company so the SOW 'ideas' cannot be shared.

children.name: Assumptions
children.definition: This is the restriction of disclosure placed on the SUPPLIER by the Company so the SOW 'ideas' cannot be shared.

children.name: AcceptanceCriteria
children.definition: This is the restriction of disclosure placed on the SUPPLIER by the Company so the SOW 'ideas' cannot be shared.

children.name: Service
children.definition: These are the service offerings that should come out of the work

children.name: ServiceLevel
children.definition: The service desired performance levels that measure the quality, quantity, timing and acceptability of the services being provided.

children.name: SLATerms
children.definition: Specifies how many SLAs to be included in order to meet the desired service level to be provided by the SUPPLIER

children.name: Monitoring
children.definition: Describes how the performance levels are supervised and monitored

children.name: ReportResolution
children.definition: Specify the contact details to report the problem to and the order in which details about the issue have to be reported & how they will be resolved

children.name: Escalation
children.definition: Specifies the proceudre on failing to meet SLA for a certain time frame specified by Supplier

children.name: Termination
children.definition: Breach of contract and termination on continuous failure to meet SLA within time frame defined in corrective action plan

children.name: ChangeControl
children.definition: This is a Scope Management Language

children.name: CRMayChangeFees
children.definition: Ability to PCR if scope or assumptions change.

children.name: CRAcceptance
children.definition: Describes how acceptance of changes in scope will be handled
